name: VSFighters
description:
Here's a little versus fighting project based on Street Fighter! My challenge was to make it playable online. 

You will need to be logged into Steam to play with your friends!

Controls (also available in game) :

  • A-Q / D : Move left / right
  • A / E : Block
  • S : Crouch
  • Z : Jump
  • G / Num 4 : Slight punch
  • H / Num 8 : Medium punch
  • J / Num 9 : Heavy punch 
  • B / Num 2 : Slight kick
  • N / Num 6 : Medium kick
  • M / Num 3 : Heavy kick
